Uses of Class
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.annotations.APILevel

  • Packages that use APILevel 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.annotations
    This package contains all non-rmi annotations.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.comm
    This Package is associated with the Communication between the ClientStart and the ServerStart.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.comm.model
    This package contains all Data-Objects, used within NetCom2.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility  

    • Uses of APILevel in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.annotations

      Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.annotations with annotations of type APILevel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      interface  Tested
      Shows that a Class is thoroughly tested.
      interface  Testing
      This annotation is used for Tests to show which class is tested.
      interface  Tests
      This Annotation is used to signal multiple different tests for the same Class.

    • Uses of APILevel in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility

      Classes in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility with annotations of type APILevel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetCom2Utils
      This Utility Class defines some methods, that are commonly used within NetCom2 Since those checks are stateless, they are static.
      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility with annotations of type APILevel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void NetCom2Utils.assertNotNull(Object... objects)
      Like NetCom2Utils.assertNotNull(Object), this method checks for null.
      static void NetCom2Utils.assertNotNull(Object o)
      This checks for null.
      static ExecutorService NetCom2Utils.createNewCachedExecutorService()
      Creates a new cached ExecutorService, based on the NetComThreadFactory.
      static NetComThreadFactory NetCom2Utils.createNewDaemonThreadFactory()
      Creates a new NetComThreadFactory, which is normally not instantiable.
      static ExecutorService NetCom2Utils.getNetComExecutorService()
      Returns a unified instances of an CachedExecutorService, based on the NetComThreadFactory.
      static ThreadFactory NetCom2Utils.getThreadFactory()
      Returns an instance of NetComThreadFactory, which is created statically The NetComThreadFactory is used for ExecutorService, that should produce NetComThread.
      static boolean NetCom2Utils.onNetComThread()
      Returns whether or not the CurrentThread is an NetComThread.
      static void NetCom2Utils.parameterNotNull(Object... objects)
      This Method checks, if the given Objects are null.
      static void NetCom2Utils.parameterNotNull(Object object)
      This Method checks, if the given Object is null.
      static void NetCom2Utils.runSynchronized(Runnable runnable)
      Executes an runnable, but synchronized synchronizes over an Semaphore.
      static <T> OnReceiveTriple<T> NetCom2Utils.wrap(OnReceive<T> onReceive)
      This Method is a short form for Wrapper.wrap(OnReceive) and uses an static instance of Wrapper This means you do not need to create Wrapper instances, whenever an OnReceive should be wrapped
      static <T> OnReceiveTriple<T> NetCom2Utils.wrap(OnReceiveSingle<T> onReceiveSingle)
      This Method is a short form for Wrapper.wrap(OnReceiveSingle) and uses an static instance of Wrapper This means you do not need to create Wrapper instances, whenever an OnReceive should be wrapped
